If it doesnt work try this:

If you get the error when trying to start the game, do this:

1. Open the file "system.cfg" with a notepad app.

2. Locate the row beginning with "sys_game_folder".

3. Change the line to "sys_game_folder=location", location being the path to your crysisgame2 folder.

For me it was: sys_game_folder=F:\Crysis 2\gamecrysis2

for those who hate motion blur like me, add this to your shortcut properties:
+r_MotionBlur=0

so it looks like:
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\Crytek\Crysis 2\bin32\Crysis2.exe" +r_MotionBlur=0

helped me out alot

Why do assholes zip games twice? WTF is the point? It makes no sense. I can deal with a bunch of rars, but when that rar contains another fucking compressed file, that's just annoying and completely unnecessary.

Also there is no reason not to buy the game. This is not a typical console port, at all. The PC version features higher resolution textures and DX11 support. It's way fucking better than the console version, and I think that deserves some recognition, because from a financial standpoint they didn't even NEED to release it for PC, let alone give us exclusive features.

For those of you getting the patch download, make sure to run Crysis2.exe from the game directory manually instead of using the shortcut the installer creates.  This bypasses the Crysis2Launcher which downloads the patch.

I found out this game forces you into updates so delete all of the contents of C:/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/Crytek/Crysis 2/bin32/EAcore. After you do this there no longer will be any more forced update. When you start the game it takes a bit longer, but it still loads! Just leave the EAcore folder there empty!

Dear fellow Pirates,

DO NOT STEAL THIS GAME. I'm a die-hard pirate myself but this title is just too... wrong. Crytek is extremely dedicated to PC gaming, they're one of the few big companies that make games exclusively for PC gamers. This title was on other platforms but everyone knows who it's meant for. DON'T MESS THIS UP! crysis 2 has been devastated, cracked before its release AND multiplayer cracked too? if this doesn't end now it may be the end of PC gaming as a whole. BUY THIS GAME!

@ pclove: Lol at u. Crysis 2 is a console port through and through. Oh Dx 11 is coming? It should have been there from day one along with proper 64 bit support. Any pc owner with more than 4gb ram would be hard pressed to see Cryteks love. Crysis 1 set a standard for pc games at the time of it's release, Crysis 2 is not even an attempt at that

and btw, I have always found it to be a funny notion that consoles will one day kill pc-games, since you don't even need cracks or serial keys for pirated console games. Once chipped or mod'ed you just copy and play, and multi-player always works.
@ Mbb15: Don't quit! But if you do, thx for all your good work. You are much loved, all around the world :)
